data.text: Mohanraj and Magdi were very kind and lovely and we loved the high treatment and honor and we hope to see then again everytime we here and only because of the the vacation was so perfect and we miss them already so thank you for the best time ever .
data.title: Perfect

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Leading Star,

It has been our absolute pleasure to have hosted you here at The Paramount Hotel Dubai. We aim to deliver the best experience possible. 
Furthermore, I’m so glad to hear that our cast was able to make your experience a memorable one. I will pass on your humbling comments to Mohanraj, Magdi and the rest of The Paramount Hotel Dubai cast.

Your desire to come back for a sequel means a lot to us as this signifies that we have earned your trust with a wonderful and satisfying vacation. 

Thank you, once again, and it will be our joy to welcome you back in a sequel on your next visit to Dubai.

Regards,
Pascal Eggerstedt
Director
owner_response.author: Executive Office Team

data.text: The stay was amazing. The staff was very friendly especially Sajid. He was very helpful and helped us with anything we needed. Definitely look out for him when you come to stay at the Paramount! From start to finish, the room was great and the vibe was amazing.
data.title: 10/10 - Will definitely be back!

data.text: The hotel is super it was booked by mistake, but what a great Hotel I will always stay there. The staff are amazing, especially reception Concierge they really make you welcome and look after all your problems. The old Hotel has absolutely everything in there. Great Jym, one of the best I’ve been in.
data.title: Must stay hotel in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Leading Star,

We couldn't be more thrilled to read your kind words and to know that we exceeded your expectations.

Your review has truly made our day, and we can't thank you enough for taking the time to share your extraordinary experience with us. Your words inspire us to continue delivering top-notch service to all our stars. We're delighted to know that our efforts to deliver exceptional service, exquisite rooms, and attention to detail did not go unnoticed.

Thank you for choosing our high-class hotel and for being a part of our story. We look forward to creating more remarkable experiences with you in the future.

Regards,
Pascal Eggerstedt
Director
owner_response.author: Executive Office Team

data.text:
Very friendly and profession,very nice stay feeling, great hospitality, will or course return to stay.
Special thanks to monir, made our stay more pleasantful. Very clean and professional housekeeping service. Great atmosphere and all.
data.title: Great stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Leonard,

On behalf of the entire team here, I want to express our sincere gratitude for taking the time to share your positive feedback.

We're absolutely thrilled to hear about your wonderful experience with us, and I wanted to specifically mention that Monir  is delighted to have been able to assist you during your visit.

Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we are committed to continuously striving for excellence in everything we do. If you ever need further assistance or have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Once again, thank you for choosing us. We can't wait to welcome you back for another fantastic experience soon!

Warm regards

Pascal Eggerstedt
Director
owner_response.author: Executive Office Team

data.text: Hotel was nice, food was also decent but a bit expensive. All staff were very kind, friendly and helpful. Had a good man named Din who cleaned our room at looked after us so big thank you to Din. Price of hotel per night was fairly priced too. Would stay again.
data.title: 10/10 Would probably stay again
